title: (4540-117) Arouca - 9 Rua Alferes Diogo Malafaia

title: (4540) Burgo -

title: (4550) Real - Unnamed Road
description: Clay trail leading to what appears to be a church. No one on the horizon, the spot is relatively clean compared to what we have already seen in Portugal, and above all the view is breathtaking. Thank you for leaving the right impeccable, even if it means picking up some papers that are not yours.

title: (4550) Real -
description: Very nice picnic area (height: ~640m) with four tables and two covered grill stations. There is a water point and toilets, but they are not always open. The view is breathtaking and there is also a great swing. Next to the square there is a small chapel and a small stage.

title: (4540) Espiunca - EM505
description: Ground parking and boil, busy during the day and very quiet at night. Not very good entry. Ideal to access "the Paiva river footbridges"; spectacular infrastructure designed to take a walk of 8km enjoying a fantastic landscape. It is advisable to check out the entrance to the Tourism Office of Arouca beforehand

title: (4540) Albergaria da Serra -
description: Beautiful place not far from the main road, but the access is only 4x4. Maybe if you have a SUV with a good ground clearance it’s ok. Nice view to the mountains.

title: (4540) Cabreiros -
description: Large flat surface to land in the middle of the ruins of the mine. Absolute tranquility, very few walkers during the day, and no one at night. To access the nearest waterfall, the trails are not easy to find, you have to go to the village above. Superb little hike where you pass through the galleries of the mine to access a heavenly place, be careful with young children, the path is steep. Access to the sector for large vehicles is quite tense, if not impossible, the roads are very narrow and dangerous.

title: (4540) - Rua da Igreja

Good starting point for hikers.

title: (4540) Urrô - EM511

title: (4540) - EM621

parked there over night to visit the 516arouca bridge

title: () - EM612

title: (4540-021) Albisqueiros - 1916 N225
description: Public toilets, parking over night not recommend. there are markets in the morning.

title: (3730) - EM612

title: (4540) Meitriz - Beco da Costeira

title: (3730) Junqueira -

title: (4540) Cabreiros -

title: (3600) Cabril -

name: Greenval | Rural Camping
title: (3730-180) Greenval | Rural Camping
description:
About us ➡️ A project by a couple, Isabel and João, who decided in 2016 to achieve their life goals: living in peace and tranquility in nature, having moved from Porto to a rural village at an altitude of 860m, located in Serra da Freita! They bought 15 000m2 of wilderness, where they’ve been working on a sustainable rural project, in collaboration with the local community. 

What we do ➡️ We grow several fruits and greens, and raise chickens for their eggs. We also produce artisanal pizzas, biscuits, jams and liqueurs. 

We provide Yoga & Ecotherapy programs, contemplative hikes and rural experiences with the local inhabitants. 

Parking conditions ➡️ There are 6 spots next to the main house, with a view over the valley, and even the sea in the distance. 

Experiences ➡️ We provide several pre-booked activities (prices and conditions vary). 

?Yoga & Ecotherapy
?Massages and sound & vibrations with Tibetan singing bowls
?Claytherapy
?Contemplative hikes
?Hiking with the donkey
?Conversations with the villagers

Worth checking out in the vicinity
?Ponte 516 Arouca - Suspended footbridge 
?Paiva Walkways
?Centro Interpretativo das Pedras Parideiras 
?Freita Weather Radar
?Rota da Água e da Pedra - Outeiro dos Riscos
?Paraduça Bread House
?Pontemieiro artisanal cheese maker
?Lunch and dinner in the restaurant "Mira Freita" (regional restaurant right here in Felgueira) 

Welcome!

title: () - Unnamed Road
description:
Spacious flat place, good for visiting the magical village of Drave, walk 3.5 km until you get there. Easy route to the village and quite difficult on the return, since it is always uphill. There are about 300m of unpaved road to the place of overnight stay, it is not advisable to pass this place with the motorhome dirt road with parts with many deep holes.
Good trails.

title: (4690) Souselo - 3138 N222

Many thanks to the municipality of Cinfães for this very nice place, with extended view over Douro valley.

name: Casa Estêvão
title: (3660-328) Casa Estêvão

This is a remote village that welcomes life. 
• Observe and feed the farm animals(sheep, goats, pig, rabbits, chickens, fishes)
• Picking a variety of fruits directly from the trees 
• Tasty products from the farm

title: (4515) Lomba -
description: Place near the river, quiet and shaded. Accessible to several vehicles. No busy road. Close to towns with services.

title: (4690) Cinfães -
description:
If you are visiting Northern Portugal, we also invite you to our paradise. Our land is 1.3 hectare big where you can park during the day and night although it is accesible mostly only with motorbikes, cars and vans because there is a 265cm wide bridge before our place which has a little bend too. But if you come without a motorhome, you can sleep here also in a tent under the starry sky. 

If you travel with your pet, he/she is welcome here too, just let us know before you come, because we also have two dogs. 

As for the toilet, we have only one compost toilet, what you can use as well. In addition, we provide water but the drinking water is limited because we bring it from a fresh spring nearby. At the moment, for electricity, we have only a solar system, which is also limited, we can charge just the usual devices with, like phones, laptop, etc.
Anyway, if you have some extra request, let us know, because we have hammocks, slack line, picnic table and cooking stuffs, like camping gas etc, what we can also offer.

If you got interested, come and swim under the waterfalls, relax and clear your mind in the nature, enjoy the sunset from a panoramic view and let's explore Cinfães and the beautiful Douro valley with its amazing features. 
The surroundings also offers many activities such as boating on the Douro river, hiking or biking in the embrace of majestic mountains, looking round the marvellous wine region, walking around the cobbled streets of the fabulous small cities and villages and much more programs.

The price applies to one vehicle and one person per night.

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1023
description: Nice picnic area in the forest of Parque do Lodario with several small picnic areas with tables and chairs. Sufficient shade. Fresh water available and rubbish bins at every place. About 100 meters downhill there are more table sets at several pools and a view of the valley. Approach on paved road but steep. Parking at the roadside.

title: (3700-739) Mâmoa - 166 Rua Campo de Tiro
description: Flat parking of an artificial beach area, quiet at night. small walks nearby and fountain very convenient to recharge water for free. I spent a quiet night there. 4 places for online motorhomes and 15 places for fitted vans.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Parking that is taking a small road at the dam. There is a steep slope to go. A small concrete parking and another further down made of sand. We were on the second with our heavy weight. Opportunity to dive your feet in the Douro following the path at the end of the second parking. Do not be afraid of the way, it's pretty rocky. 5 minutes walk

title: (4515) Pé de Moura - 267 Largo da República
title_short: (4515) Pé de Moura - 267 Largo da República
description: Very quiet, on the banks of the Douro River (World Heritage of Humanity), without services. Possibility of water nearby. WiFi coffee Tretas. WC and playground. Leveled, no shadows. Small vehicles only.

title: (3700) - 211 Rua Casa da Mâmoa
description: Large car park. We were able to park in the back of the parking lot, further from the road. We saw no bans for the night. Relatively flat parking lot, flatter and larger than the one a little lower down.

title: (4690) - Rua de Torneiros
description: Flat concrete parking with a view of the Carrapatelo dam. The parking lot is now closed. Great views over the river. Water can be found when you leave the main road 500 meters from the car park.

title: (4515) Lomba - 41 N222
description: WATER POINT-tap with water next to the park of Merendas, at the viewpoint.

title: (4625) - 1522 N108
description: Parking below the paved church. We settled in 3 motorhomes between 6 m to 7.50 m for picnics. Possibility to turn around. Water but toilet closed. We did not stay for the night.

title: (4515) Melres - 60 Rua da Praia
description: Nice corner with beach. Very quiet and quiet away. Flat ground and paved. The toilets do not work anymore. Had an excellent night.

title: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
title_short: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
description: Small parking lot with some picnic tables very quiet

title: (4690) - Er 321
description: Portas do Montemuro, great place with a 360 degree view of the valleys. next door is a gas station. little traffic in the evening. the dog yells at the gas station at night. compensated the morning after

name: Campidouro
title: (4515) Campidouro
description: Very pleasant and quiet campsite for this period (September) with a breathtaking view of the Douro. Very large swimming pool with a snack bar. Space for children. No shops nearby. 25kms from Porto. Well shaded place. Clean sanitary facilities.

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1022
description: Above the dam that you can cross, on a connecting road over the Duro to the north! Quiet at night, around 6 o'clock the rush hour starts! Then it gets louder! Flat place!

name: Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
title: (4690) Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
description:
Mourilhe motorhome parking, camping and glamping, providing everything for a 5 star stay next to Douro River.
Prices start at 20 euros per night for a motorvan with 2 people and eletricity. 

Full price list at website

Motorhome Park | Bungalows | Restaurant | SPA | Gym | Swimming pool | Convenience store

title: (4690) - CM1022
description: Picnic area at the edge of a small waterfall, tables, toilets, water point, bardecue. Beware, this place is on the road but not very busy. The TOP for a lunch, swimming, walking along the brook ...

title: (4690) Cinfães - 23 Rua São Sebastião
description: 20 car parking spaces near a municipal football stadium. flat car park.

title: (4575) Rio de Moinhos - 543 Rua Souto
description: Large parking lot, empty all day. At night a bit of passage because the young people meet here, but it remains calm. The view is very nice, and if you have any concerns there is a great mechanic nearby. Quite a few strays though, so my dogs spent quite a bit of time barking. There is a park 20min walk away, and the douro is 30min away. There is a hiking trail that starts from the town. Attention, no shade, spot exposed from 09:00 to evening. And quite difficult to access because narrow street and people park there. My cc is 2m15 wide, and 6.80 long: that was right.

title: (4515) Melres - 315 Rua de Midões
description: Located on the small beach on the Duo River. There is even a small swimming area supervised by lifeguards. After the restaurant, go straight to the end and turn left into the gravel road. On the left side can be parked, on the right is the restricted stop. During the day boats and bathers. With motorhome 6.80 m no problem. The weekend is busy.. Families come in the morning from 9 a.m. Calm during the week.

title: (4690) Cinfães - 1 Rua Santa Bárbara
description: Large parking at the entrance of the city. All shops nearby

title: (4515) Melres - Rua da Portagem
description: Supervised beach, parking nearby with various snacks

title: (4515-552) Melres - 80 Rua Padre Jerónimo
description: Parking in a green area next to the Duero river and with a river beach, bars, restaurants, supermarket and showers on the beach. Very quiet place to spend the night and very good access for motorhomes even with a trailer.

title: (4515-542) Montezelo - 357 Rua do Montezelo
description: Parking at the leisure center, small grocery store open very late. Many places available, sloping access, beware of the hitch that rubbed when leaving. Calm at night but beware of the rooster in the early morning. No possibility of emptying. Convenient for a night in troubleshooting given the few areas in this region.

title: (4625) Favões - Unnamed Road
description: River beach, very peaceful and cleaned. A lot of people camping over night. Ideal for relax, take sun and swimming. The access is steep not ideal for the biggest campervans.

title: (3740-418) Dornelas - Unnamed Road
description: Great little spot by the creek. Quiet and peaceful with a few spots for campers and motor homes. There is water and picnic tables but the toilets were locked when we were here. There is a gorgeous hike to an amazing waterfall nearby. There was nobody there when we went and it was magic. This place is a hidden gem, incl public toilets with toilet paper. enormous amount of benches and public bbq's

title: (4515) Lomba - Rua da Bouça
description: Very nice place on Praia da Lomba, right at the end of the peninsula. The parking lot is directly at the lido, which is why there are many parking spaces. ATTENTION: The way there could be too narrow / steep for some vehicles. However, the view is worth the effort.

title: () - Rua Carvalha
description: Picknick area with several places for overnight stay 24h.

Laundry facilities outside the Intermarche and another one inside.
4 EUR washing, 2 EUR dryer 20min.
"Cheap" fuel, in relation.

description: Green space with am shadows and picnic tables, having public grills has a snack bar, has a small stream but it is not allowed to swim too much, very quiet to spend the day just picnic with grills, with coffee and bath rooms, ideal for a stroll pedestrian, has a small stream but can take baths.

title: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
title_short: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
description: Public parking lot without access control and security guard, but is illuminated during the night and very quiet. On the main street near to the place there are some services like bakery, cafeteria, ATM and the Municipal Market.

title: (3680) Arcozelo das Maias - Rua da Estação
title_short: (3680) Arcozelo das Maias - Rua da Estação
description:
Small car park next to the old station for 2 or 3 quiet flat motorhomes accessible to any size motorhome
Departure of hiking or cycling the old railway line is equipped for bicycles and pedestrians
Ideal for nature lovers

title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - 11 Rua Olheirão
description: Difficult to park in this a little mountainous town so the free illuminated parking in front of a school (700 m away from center) is interesting out lessons timetable. Hyper calm except around 8:15 when buses and cars drop off children.

title: () Paços de Gaiolo - N108
description: Great view of the Douro. On the N-108 road.

title: (4505) Caldas de São Jorge - 73 Rua Dona Graciete Santos
title_short: (4505) Caldas de São Jorge - 73 Rua Dona Graciete Santos
description: These are thermal baths accessible to all with very pleasant water.

title: (4575) Penafiel - 212 Avenida São Miguel
description: Intermarché Termas São Vicente (Penafiel - Porto)

title: (3740) - Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (3740)  - Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Very nice place with all over the valley and the sea in the sun unfortunately it was raining. Calm spent one night, WC present but closed.

address.street: Rua de Nossa Senhora da Penha

name: Chapel Picnic Park
title: (4575) Chapel Picnic Park
description: Parque de merendas de capela. Picnic Park with lots of parking for overnighting. Small bar during peak summer season.

title: (4505, Port) - 150 Avenida Parque Desportivo
description: Quiet car park with a nice view of the city, above a school (a few cars around 9 a.m.) and craft area. forest nearby, for walks.

title: (4505) Vale Da Cabra - 1334 Rua Principal
description: Free source drinking water

title: (3680) Ribeiradio - N16
description: Very quiet place to stay. Coffee and mini market nearby.

title: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 122 Rua Doutor Manuel Brandão
title_short: (3720) Oliveira de Azeméis - 122 Rua Doutor Manuel Brandão
description: washing machine internet cafe

title: (4640) Baião - N211
description: A small dirt parking lot can be level ready along the river Douro. A spring water source of the mountain. No development. Apparently very calm.

title: (3720) Teso - 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães
title_short: (3720) Teso - 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães
description: Laundry Self-service.

address.street: 408 Rua do Clube Desportivo de Cucujães

title: (3740) - 82 Rua da Pereira
description:
Small cars only!
Parking in front of 2 bars. You can make a route to see the Cabreia waterfall where you can bathe.

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - Unnamed Road
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park next to the river beach of pouves with some picnic tables and a small animal-friendly beach. Very narrow road not recommended for caravans only for vans. I spent a night there to sleep, very quiet, only dogs barking in the houses in the neighborhood

title: (3680) Ribeiradio - CM1269
description: Quiet park to rest. Surrounded by nature. The water

title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - 3 Largo Feira
description: Large free public P on area of fair (Largo da Feira) that happens each 2nd and 4th Monday (when impossible to park night before). It is illuminated but not fully leveled. Near secondary road with low traffic by night. Easy walking distance (400m) till town center.

title: (4505) Salgueiral - 760 Rua Principal
description: Drinking water from the source with wash-house

title: (4690) Oliveira do Douro - N222
description: Picnic area with grill at the viewpoint

title: (4630) Paredes de Viadores - M584
description: Very well organized picnic area! Large car park with two entrances, without stripes. So also long campers ok. It is close to the road, so I don't know if there is any noise from cars in the evening. Excellent for a daytime stopover, with tables and grill available. Field to play. Public toilets from the main entrance. Super quiet. Maybe over the weekend it will be busier.

title: (4505) Fiães - 4505 Rua Rio Uima
description: Quiet place to sleep and to spend a day in nature, walking or biking in the natural park (passadiços de Fiães, Parque das Ribeiras). Picnic area not far away

title: (3660) - N228
description: Small picnic or sleeping area, with barbecue and water. Near soccer fields and games for children. Very basic but little help if you are around. Nearby road.

title: (3660-482) São Pedro do Sul - 61 Rua Camões
title_short: (3660-482) São Pedro do Sul - 61 Rua Camões
description: Drinking water fountain. You have to be patient because the flow is low but the water is fresh and I think untreated. There is no indication of control or not but a local confirmed to me that it was drinkable and there is a sign in Portuguese which also suggests that it is drinkable (something like "provision by the town hall ")

title: (4560) -
description: Great paved spot by the water with shadows and picnic areas. A bar open until midnight can cause a bit of noise at night, but it's also a great place to have a beer.

title: (4560) - Rua do Salgueiral
description: Small earthen car park just above the spot on the edge of the Drouo. No service but allows you to spend a quiet night away from the bar which al ere to sing all evening on this Saturday. Place flat and quite far from the road. So pretty cool

title: (3660-432) São Pedro do Sul - 350 Rua Correia de Oliveira
title_short: (3660-432) São Pedro do Sul - 350 Rua Correia de Oliveira
description: Has a laundry self-Service, and supermarket, has a little place for breakfast and free bathrooms.

title: (3660-510) São Pedro do Sul - 96 Rua São Vicente de Paula
title_short: (3660-510) São Pedro do Sul - 96 Rua São Vicente de Paula
description: Next to the supermarket there is a small dead end street with (sloping) parking spaces. Suitable for visiting the place, not for sleeping.

title: (4575-580) Valpedre -
description:
Recently built, beautiful and calm place with all facilities for motorhomes.
Washing basins, bathrooms and showers available. Secure Wi-Fi service. Not possible to use hotel amenities.

title: (3680) Oliveira de Frades - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place for meditation under a large oak tree on a dolmen hill. Also accessible via dirt road for large mobile homes xxl. Very good turnaround. Going around the hill to make a turn is quite possible. Unfortunately, the entrance to the inside of the dolmen is not accessible. But a quiet retreat for nature lovers.

title: (4515-345) Medas - 472 Avenida Central de Broalhos
description: Self-service laundromat 24/24

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Av. da Ponte
title_short: (3660) São Pedro do Sul, Portugal - Av. da Ponte
description: Quiet carpark close to Lidl and park with playground and skate park. the park seems to host a market (don't know which days). no specific cat park spaces for campervans

title: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul -
description: Self service laundry (laundry) in the parking lot of an Intermarché

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato
description: Forecourt of a small chapel with centuries-old olive trees. Drinking water tap next door. Access a bit complicated: it's easier to get in and out in reverse.

address.street: R. da Escola Profa. Ema Pato

title: (4640) Ancede - 173 Rua do Cruzeiro
description: I discovered this watering hole along the rota de romanico. The water tastes good and you can probably even wash clothes and/or dishes here. There is a large parking lot opposite.

title: (3660-427) São Pedro do Sul - 18 Rua do Ourino
title_short: (3660-427) São Pedro do Sul - 18 Rua do Ourino
description: Big parking with lots of space. restaurant nearby, recreation area, walks, bicycle track and toilets.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 640 Rua de Paçô
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 640 Rua de Paçô
description: Old Cedrim train station with 3 parking spaces and 2 more for the disabled. The entrance is somewhat narrow for a motorhome, not recommended for trailers narrow area to maneuver.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 42 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 42 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
description: Small launderette with dryer very clean and maintained.  Attention choose the program before starting otherwise it chooses by default. A very nice manager is on site but only speaks Portuguese.

title: (3600) Pepim - N288
description: Old road overlooking a football field. a bit off the current road. In the middle of nature but without any particular charm. Helps out well for one night.

title: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
description: Park  near Douro river to rest

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 15 Rua da Igreja
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 15 Rua da Igreja
description: Nice, quite place ideal for day or overnight. At the city park with lots of playing for kids. 2m walk from city center with many shops around. (Shade in the Summer). don’t miss the river beach at Pessegueiro do Vouga

title: (3660) São Pedro do Sul - N16
description: Nice rest area with beautiful views, good for lunch or just to stop for break.

title: () São Pedro do Sul - Rua da Fontinha
title_short: () São Pedro do Sul - Rua da Fontinha
description: Convenient service area and parking near the thermal baths, but not used as a swimming pool, but mostly medical. All free and very quiet. Not suitable for motorhomes longer than 6m. Visiting the village and hot spring is a real pleasure. There is an outdoor pool on site, 10 minutes walk.

title: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul - 45 Beco da Bouça
title_short: (3660-683) São Pedro do Sul - 45 Beco da Bouça
description: Nice Park out of high season (summer). Not caravan permitted but nobody is there in Autumn and Winter. We were alone!

title: (3720-561) Besteiros - 57 Travessa do Sobreiral
description: Drinking water fountain, perfect for filling bottles or tanks, you can stop right in front with the van. The town is really calm.

title: (4520-209) Santa Maria da Feira - 28 Rua Doutor Vaz Ferreira
title_short: (4520-209) Santa Maria da Feira - 28 Rua Doutor Vaz Ferreira
description:
Quiet Location in a dead end road with a view to the at night illuminated church. No traffic in this street. Parking lane along the road. Spent a relaxed and undisturbed night. In the morning birds singing and rooster crows.

Ideal if you want to stay near but Not directly in Porto.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 217 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
title_short: (3740) Sever do Vouga - 217 Avenida Comendador Augusto Martins Pereira
description: Next to the municipal swimming pools

title: (4520-200) Santa Maria da Feira - 54 Rua das Fogaceiras
title_short: (4520-200) Santa Maria da Feira - 54 Rua das Fogaceiras
description: Great place to stay overnight, really very quiet, the reviews about the other places in the city the common note was the noise and lack of peace, so I found this little paradise! it is in the shade of the trees by the little river. On a Saturday night I was the only one parked there. I believe it’s a good place for the weekends!

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 7 Largo Igreja
description: Public toilets, church and cleaning water on a fountain to drink. Trilho da Lombeira passes here

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 175 Rua Luis de Camões
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 175 Rua Luis de Camões
description:
Laundromat
hours 7 a.m. / 11 p.m.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
title_short: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
description: Park day/night near the church

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 16 Rua Raposeira
description:
For filling clean water only.
Public place.

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa
description: Site for parking and overnight. Near the Castle.

address.street: 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa

title: () Santa Maria da Feira -
description: Parking quiet bathrooms nearby

title: (4560) - N319
description: Free day and night parking with restrooms near historic village of Quintandona

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
description: Park near Douro river

title: (3600-102) Castro Daire - 24 Rua da Portela
description:
Picnic area with a bombastic view, drinking water and the possibility to stand overnight.
Located on a 10km circular hiking trail. (information board at the church in the village)

Access rather nothing for huge ships.

title: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 34 Avenida 25 de Abril
title_short: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 34 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Parking 1 km from the Christmas village of Perlim (Portugal). Very spacious, you can spend the night, there are no services. There is a petrol station next to the parking lot. Ideal to go to see the town and sleep. Too quiet. Parking is hard ground.

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 719 N108
description: In front of the Douro river. Beautiful view. Parking only. No services Bar and Marina next door. Safe place.

title: (4515) Covelo - Praceta Gastão Fernandes Guedes
description: Parking possible at the marina, attention to cantilever    slope, we arrived at night, certainly little room in the day, noisy cafe with lots of cars on weekends

title: (3600) Castro Daire - N228
description: Small dirt parking off the road. Surrounded by Eucalyptus trees. We just stopped to got for a walk, but for one night, it could be a nice, quiet spot.

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 21 Largo Camões
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 21 Largo Camões
description: Free and shaded parking, right next to public wc, various cafes and a fountain (i don't know if the water is drinkable). Various monuments to visit from there (castle, church, the path of trees, etc.). The tourist office is a 3 minute walk away. There is also a children's play area just above the parking lot, with a mini-golf course. During the day for sure, but be careful at night, there are walkers.

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - Alameda Roberto Vaz de Oliveira
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - Alameda Roberto Vaz de Oliveira
description: Very beautiful medieval castle to visit, 3 euros adults and 1 euro big child. Possibility to fill the water maybe not for drinking but for cooking, shower, dishes. Sorting bin. Large park on the way down to the city center with an interesting museum with a great view. Many possibilities for sleeping, 2 parking lots or dirt road behind.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 1879 N228
description: Drinking water fountain well suited for filling water canisters. Large parking space.

title: (3670-261) Vouzela - 3 Largo Feira
description: Relatively quiet P with good space for big motorhomes but with big trees. Good start point for a visit to this nice small town. It is mountain bike center (see photo) including long flat bicycle track (Ecovia do Vouga) along previous train line that follows Vouga river deep valley, that has here very long stone bridge nearly over historic center as well as old steam locomotive on eastern top. As fare area is just opposite side of road (Largo da Feira), it may be busy on previous hours and along (once a month).

title: (3720-411) Palmaz - Rua dos 22
description: Place in the heart of nature, in the middle of the woods, where total calm reigns. Possibility of finding another place in this maze of paths. Completely passable.

title: (4415) Lever - Vereda do Laboratório
description: Disused quay next to the dam

title: (4515) Covelo - 9 Praceta Santa Isabel
description: Parking around a large paved square. Possibility to spend the night in peace on the back, away from the road. Step to start the Douro Valley. No service except for a few small trash cans around the square.

title: (4535-014) Lourosa -
description: Excellent self service laundry. To wash and dry. Clean and friendly.

title: (3740) Sever do Vouga -
description: There is a small parking bay right by the old mines "Parque das Minas do Braçal". Very quiet, you can only hear the river. Further back in the facilities, there is also a small waterfall. There is nothing outside of nature here. Take your rubbish back with you. Thank you. It is of course not for large motorhomes, just for vans and smaller ones. The way need patience.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 6 Rua Cabine
description: Parking

title: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 91 Rua Comendador Sá Couto
title_short: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 91 Rua Comendador Sá Couto
description: Fountain with drinking water, right next to the "CONTINENTE" shopping center and other shops. There are therefore several parking spaces, electricity in the shopping center, toilets and wifi.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Great place for a night of absolute calm, this has been a real pleasure for us. There are toilets but closed that day, a water tap, is she drinking? Plenty of room. A stone stairway leads to a remarkable views of the Douro Valley. The site is perfectly accessible to the motorhome by narrow roads but passes it hassle-free.

title: (4520-176) Santa Maria da Feira - 8 Rua Penas
title_short: (4520-176) Santa Maria da Feira - 8 Rua Penas
description: Quiet parking near the center. Behind the Continente supermarket that has washing and drying machines. There is a fountain nearby. It does not have a parking meter and you can walk to visit the city. We spent two quiet nights.

title: (3670-261) Vouzela - 5 Porto Salto
description: Free public P in front of school (Escola Secundária) of Vizela small town, leveled and illuminated, either with or without trees. It lies 1 km away from historic center and long stone bridge ex-train and at higher level than town. Very quiet out of school activity.

title: (4415) Crestuma - Rua Fontinha
description: Free parking with a good view to the dam.

title: (3600-136) Castro Daire - 89 Avenida António Serrado
description: Just off an n2 roundabout, 10 minutes walk into the town. Car park shaded by trees. There are picnic benches to sit at.  Day parking only.  we have a 7m motor home, and as car park, was pretty empty could manoeuvre without a problem.  if car park is busy, then probably more suited to a smaller camper van.

title: (4640) Mesquinhata -
description:
Paved road leading to a motorable track, more for Vans and vans, with small spaces on the side to spend a cool and quiet night, almost at the top of the hill, in the middle of the pampas...
distant view of the Douro Valley.

title: (3720) Pinheiro da Bemposta - 850 IC2
description: It is a picnic area with a lot of shade, it has a barbecue area and tables to eat in the shade of the trees. It also has ample parking for a motorhome and access is easy to get to.

title: (4520-224) Santa Maria da Feira - 5 Rua Arlindo de Sousa
title_short: (4520-224) Santa Maria da Feira - 5 Rua Arlindo de Sousa
description: Free parking (day & night) in front of the "Armazém do caffè" café. Not very far from the city center and the castle. There is a shopping center also a 7 minute walk away (CONTINENT). We slept 3 nights in this car park, it's quite safe (security level) but on the other hand there is a lot of car traffic at night (until around midnight) and sometimes a dog who walks alone and barks (but it doesn't last long). But the place is good because "safe" . There is also a sorting location in the parking lot, to empty the various waste (glass, plastic, paper and incinerables). Unfortunately I didn't think about taking a photo when we were there.

title: (4630) - 2633 N210
description: Quiet place in the aisles. Park and stay next to the houses next to the church at the door. But if it is closed there is another one opposite which is wide and open.

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description:
Shady parking spot near the Douro River.

There's a bar upstairs and some granit tables. Relatively flat area. Calm except for the road and some fishermen.

title: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Easy parking above a sports field, with beautiful views and no lighting. Located in a quiet residential area, uncrowded at night, little traffic in the morning, some dogs barking at night. Not the most charming place, but good enough for one night.

title: () - 1145 Rua do Mouquinho
description: Very large parking lot between the forest and the stadium of Sao Martinho da Gandara. Absolute calm, stabilized soil and easy to access. Ideal for a night stopover or picnic. Village center within walking distance ... No service.

title: (4415-616) Crestuma - 16 Rua Fontinha
description: A beautiful place to be at night.  A place with a lot of movement for the summer, in the spring a little movement and in the winter very quiet.  In winter a small cafe is open and the Marquês das Francesinhas only opens a few hours during the day.  Very quiet place in winter.

title: (3720) - 419 Rua da Abolembra
description: Security place to sleep
